title: The Lipstick Murders: A Faye-Lynn Johnson Mystery
description: Chief of Police Nick Burns reopens a chilling twelve-year-old murder case, unearthing long-submerged secrets. Assigned to the case, brilliant young detective Faye-Lynn Johnson races against time as the body count rises and the killer threatens to strike again. As past and present collide, they must navigate a treacherous web of deceit, betrayal, and danger. Will Faye-Lynn solve The Lipstick Murders before the elusive killer claims more victims? A gripping, heart-pounding thriller that will keep you guessing until the very end.
author: Ricky Corum
